app.name: Brawl Themed Project+
app.coder: ilikepizza107 w/ credit to the P+DT
app.long_description: Brawl Themed Project+ is a mod of Project+ with the gameplay and QoL of P+ and the asthetics of Brawl. This mod would not be possible without the longstanding support of the Brawl Modding community. Thank you for playing!
